# netbox_service (Data Source)

Retrieves information about a network service in NetBox.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Look up service by ID
data "netbox_service" "by_id" {
  id = "1"
}

# Look up service by name and device
data "netbox_service" "by_name_and_device" {
  name   = "http"
  device = "1"
}

# Look up service by name and virtual machine
data "netbox_service" "by_name_and_vm" {
  name            = "ssh"
  virtual_machine = "1"
}

output "service_by_id" {
  value = data.netbox_service.by_id.name
}

output "service_protocol" {
  value = data.netbox_service.by_name_and_device.protocol
}

output "service_ports" {
  value = data.netbox_service.by_name_and_device.ports
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `device` (String) The device this service runs on (ID). Use with name for lookup.
- `id` (String) The unique numeric ID of the service. Use this to look up by ID.
- `name` (String) The name of the service. Use with device or virtual_machine for lookup.
- `virtual_machine` (String) The virtual machine this service runs on (ID). Use with name for lookup.

### Read-Only

- `comments` (String) Additional comments.
- `custom_fields` (Attributes Set) Custom fields assigned to this resource. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--custom_fields))
- `description` (String) A description of the service.
- `display_name` (String) The display name of the service.
- `ipaddresses` (List of Number) List of IP address IDs associated with this service.
- `ports` (List of Number) List of port numbers the service listens on.
- `protocol` (String) The protocol used by the service.
- `tags` (Attributes Set) Tags assigned to this resource. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--tags))

<a id="nestedatt--custom_fields"></a>
### Nested Schema for `custom_fields`

Read-Only:

- `name` (String) Name of the custom field.
- `type` (String) Type of the custom field.
- `value` (String) Value of the custom field.


<a id="nestedatt--tags"></a>
### Nested Schema for `tags`

Read-Only:

- `name` (String) Name of the tag.
- `slug` (String) Slug of the tag.
